column4: i installed the newest ubuntu today and been playing around a bit with it. for me who has used MS in all my years. this is just awefull to use. not even a start menu :p i saw something called kde that is simmelar to MS, how do i install this ?
Firstly, give it a chance - it's different, but it's not necessarily bad.  Second, Kubuntu is the KDE version of Ubuntu, and theadmin just had the bot provide instructions for that.
i gave it a try. its bad for me. you know. its hard to teach a old dog new tricks. same goes for me and gui :p
Fair enough, I suppose.  Look at the instructions the bot pointed at, then.
